DOC.brief_summary: Implant placement may trigger bone trauma , might result 3-dimensional bone change . While process peri-implant disease well understood , implant position within bony structure might play role . However , data available regard .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Buccal Bone Thickness Pathological Peri-implant Bone Loss : A 3-year Prospective Cohort Study
